alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Lexington; Newberry; Richland; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 4:38PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Fairfield, south central Newberry, central Lexington, east central Saluda and northwestern Richland Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 438 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Jenkinsville to near Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam to 7 miles northeast of Saluda. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Murray Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, West Columbia, Cayce, Irmo, Forest Acres, Batesburg-Leesville, Springdale, St. Andrews, Dentsville, Oak Grove, Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, Red Bank, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Arcadia Lakes, Columbia International University, Harbison State Forest, Sesquicentennial State Park, and Lake Carolina. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 43 and 81. Interstate 26 between mile markers 91 and 118. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
